short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full size photo viewer for https://www.yachtworld.com/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your YachtWorld browsing experience! This extension transforms the way you view boat photos on yachtworld.com. Instead of the standard carousel view, our tool introduces a button that unveils a full-window photo viewer. Dive deeper into the details and enjoy boat visuals like never before.
